metadata.title: CVE-2021-3569 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack corruption bug was found in libtpms in versions before 0.7.2 and before 0.8.0 while decrypting data using RSA. This flaw could result in a SIGBUS (bad memory access) and termination of swtpm. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: libtpms package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
